Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    pdftron.PDF.PDFViewCtrl.gotoPage(int)
    Replaced by PDFViewCtrl.setCurrentPage(int).
    pdftron.PDF.PDFViewCtrl.lockDoc(boolean)
    Please, use PDFViewCtrl.docLock(boolean) instead.
    pdftron.PDF.PDFViewCtrl.lockReadDoc()
    Please, use PDFViewCtrl.docLockRead() instead.
    pdftron.PDF.PDFViewCtrl.setUseThumbView(boolean, boolean, int)
    Replaced by PDFViewCtrl.setupThumbnails(boolean, boolean, boolean, int, String, int). Note that this method has no effect and will throw a PDFNetException.
    pdftron.PDF.PDFViewCtrl.tryLockDoc()
    Please, use PDFViewCtrl.docTryLock() instead.
    pdftron.PDF.PDFViewCtrl.tryLockReadDoc()
    Please, use PDFViewCtrl.docTryLockRead() instead.
    pdftron.PDF.PDFViewCtrl.unlockDoc()
    Please, use PDFViewCtrl.docUnlock() instead.
    pdftron.PDF.PDFViewCtrl.unlockReadDoc()
    Please, use PDFViewCtrl.docUnlockRead() instead.
